features: Powerful hydrating and anti-aging face moisturizer and eye cream
Powerful natural ingredients like shea butter, safflower oil, jojoba oil and protective Alpine Caribou Moss help tough skin stay hydrated and protected
Absorbs deep into your pores to nourish and sooth skin
Unique ingredient Alpine Caribou Moss has proven antioxidant properties, preventing wrinkles and soothing and replenishing skin
body.description: Product Description Ultra hydrating and anti-aging face moisturizer and eye cream. This moisturizer quenches skin and restores its youthfulness without leaving your skin shiny or feeling oily. Alcohol-free so it will not irritate the skin post shave. Non-greasy and fast-absorbing. Aloe Leaf Juice and Vitamin E moisturize and fight free radicals, a main culprit of aging. Meanwhile, Alpine Caribou Moss boosts elasticity and guards against environmental stressors such as pollution. Apply evenly on clean skin morning and night. Apply a thin layer under your eyes and thicker amount on the rest of your face. May be used after shaving. TSA-approved and travel-friendly making it perfect for when you're on-the-go. Free from Parabens, Phthalates, Sulfates and Gluten. Animal Cruelty-free and Vegan. brand_description We create natural, powerful skin care products without any toxins. We've engineered and tested products that work as hard as you do. The result? Powerful, natural, non-toxic, TSA-approved skin care at a price point that suits.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Face + Eye Cream Solid Face Wash Wake Up Eye Stick Wake Up Face Serum Everyday Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer with SPF 37 Anti-Everything Pads Benefits It's light, absorbs quickly, and won't leave your skin greasy. Our balanced formula is unscented, great for all skin types and made to use on both your face and under-eye area. Activated Charcoal and other exfoliants draw out impurities and dissolve deep-down dirt. The solid stick form is spill-free, travel-friendly and fun to use. Simply apply to your face and massage with wet fingers. Our Wake Up Eye Stick with caffeine helps cool and depuff your undereyes any time of day. Looking awake has never been so easy. The 3 key ingredients work together to address a range of skin issues, including helping to reduce redness, hyperpigmentation, dark spots, fine lines/wrinkles, and dry skin Light, oil-free, non-greasy and reef friendly. SPF 37 protects you from the sun and defends your skin against signs of aging Exfoliates to remove dead skin cells and reduces the buildup that can cause breakouts, blackheads, and ingrown haris, and helps minimize the appearance of pores Key Ingredients Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, Alpine Caribou Moss, Vitamin E, Safflower Oil Activated Charcoal, Alpine Caribou Moss, and Coconut Extract Aloe Vera, Alpine Caribou Moss, Caffeine Encapsulated Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamin E Hyaluronic Acid, Alpine Caribou Moss, Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 Glycolic Acid and Salicylic Acid Application Apply evenly on clean skin morning and night. Apply a thin layer under your eyes and thicker amount on the rest of your face. May be used after shaving Apply stick to face, wet fingers and gentrly massage around face to activate. Rinse and pat dry. Gently roll across under-eye area twice per use. Apply a thin layer of serum to clean, dry skin on the neck and face area Simply apply to your face and neck as you would a typical face moisturizer Gently wipe over clean face and neck. Skin Types All All All All All All Free From Free of alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and talc. Vegan and cruelty free Free of alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and talc. Vegan and cruelty free Free of alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and talc. Vegan and cruelty free Free of alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and talc. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly unscented silky moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I am sensitive to scent. I also have aging skin. I bought this because so many of the moisturizers marketed to women are crazy scented. This moisturizer blends into my skin easily. It is not oily. There is no scent. It’s a light moisturizer, but it doesn’t leave my skin dry either. Not at all waxy or oily feeling. I will continue to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Odorless, no break-outs
reviews.reviewText: This is the best facial moisturizer I have found. It has essentially no smell, it absorbs quickly into my skin, and it isn't oily. I've never had any blemishes or break-outs around the use of this product, and I cannot say the same for other products I have tried, like Dove Men+Care's moisturizing face cream. My experience has been very good, and I will continue to use Oars + Alps. I do wish the price was lower and the tube was larger, but a little bit seems to go a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Skin drinks it in.
reviews.reviewText: This product feels nice on the skin, sets in well. Lasts quite awhile but not all day or all night. It is a good moisturizer and would be great for someone with moderately dry skin loos for a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best so far!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best lotion I’ve used so far. It’s thicker than all the others I’ve used and moisturizes really well. With this one, I only need one coat, whereas with others, it takes 2-3. It’s on the pricey side, but I’ve found it’s worth it. Glad I found one that works well for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: my old moisturizer was discontinued and wanted to find a light, non-greasy replacement. Oars and Alps does the job. Goes on light and keeps my skin from drying out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Face stuff for dudes
reviews.reviewText: I can't pretend that I understand the cosmetics market in any way--everyone has different ingredients, many with slightly nuanced versions of slightly better or worse moisturizers for slightly differing types of skin or whatever. And the scents? Oh man, some are pleasantly light, and others are like gargling with old spice deodorant while slapping yourself with leather bound birch branches. Overwhelming and unnecessary. My demands from cosmetics are mainly that it doesn't tick me off while trying to do its job.What I love about this product is that is truly is scent free, goes on easy and "sheer," is super lightweight, and I don't feel like some kind of Hollywood a-hole for trying to moisturize my skin a little after a shower and shave with this stuff. I'm just a regular dude, getting just a little older, who likes to be clean and shaven, and this stuff seems to work well. No hassle, no stink, no gritty or slimy feeling.I can't tell you if pure hyloronic acid, or jojo oil, or buttermilk is better in some way that I just haven't researched enough on; what I can tell you is that it works well and I don't mind using it everyday/every time I shave.I am mainly reviewing this, as I buy it yet again, to remind myself that this is the one I tried and liked way more than a few of the other similar options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a good middle ground -- not too heavy
reviews.reviewText: It's a good middle ground -- not too heavy, not too lightweight. I'll use this moisturizer up, but not sure I'd consider it a staple skincare product for women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t clog my pores, and doesn’t stink
reviews.reviewText: Most other moisturizers cause my skin to break out. This stuff doesn’t. It moisturizes really well without being too heavy. And it doesn’t stink! It’s unscented. Ahhhh.
